description.value: You can widen your field of vision, allowing you to affect more creatures with your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Hypnotic Lure]. Once per day, when you use Hypnotic Lure, you can affect all creatures in a @Template[cone|distance:30], rather than one creature within 30 feet.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
